title: jaycsantos.com v4 (self)
description: V4 of personal website. Best viewed in dark mode.

title: "Colaboration App"
description: Spearheaded fullstack dev on a white label app for collaboration and publishing in realtime and offline.
Co-designed the json schema; wrote and maintained the firestore rules with minimal yet secure access control.
Integrated with 3rd party services like giftbit API to provide user rewards.
Ensured flutter web performed efficiently by developing direct integrations to web libraries.
Implemented UI components with accessibility compliance from ground up.

title: "Photo Sharing App" (unpublished)
description: Fullstack mobile/web research and development on a "photo sharing app" with realtime sync.
Experimented with an algorithm that automatically grouped photos from a specific time and location.
Spearheaded the project MVP then later supervised the migration to new stack with junior devs.

title: "Inventory App" (unpublished)
description: Spearheaded research and development on an inventory app with offline and realtime sync capabilities.
Worked closely with UX designers to greatly improve user flow in asset management by streamlining the workflow.

title: GradGuru/MyCoach Console V3
description: Rebranded and redesigned the console web app to use Material UI.
Made user experience revamps like list filtering, infinite scrolling, scroll states, drag-n-drop features, batch data processing/parsing/validations and WCAG AA compliance.
Added integrations to Salesforce API and Okta 2FA.
Designed reports dashboard and pages with interactive charts.

title: GradGuru Console V2
description: Continued migration on the web console from PHP to angular while adding new features and integrations.
Developed a custom date picker with a heatmap view for dates with significant targeted content.
Created an interactive flowchart editor that allows users to design chatbot flows and also simulate it within.
Documented user flows and features and how to use them.

title: The H Hub (freelance)
description: Commision work to add new features, functions and integrate new api end points.

title: Omnifi-Modeler
description: A web based visual model editor for state machine flow which is synced across multiple users.
Developed interactions like drag-and-drop and inline editing also did data parsing from/to data model.
Paired with the senior architect, developed the front-end of the app.

title: Pumba
description: Solo project: An internal web tool that queries redmine tickets via rest API & displays a dynamic data table & visual trend graph on metrics.
Product was used by QA team to analyze their performance.

title: Web Soundboard
description: A soundboard PWA. Used in a holiday live presentation that needed on-the-fly sound effects and background music.
https://github.com/jaycsantos/mario-soundboard

title: Prudle
description: Solo Project: An internal web tool that parses possible grammars from a GRXML/VGSL value set.
Product was used by the QA team to assist with the generated grammar models during testing.

title: 24HourAsnwers (freelance)
description: Comissioned to co-develop a mobile app using phonegap/cordova.
The app enables users to manage tutoring, requests and payments.

title: "Chat Upgrade" Demo
description: Made a demo page for a sales presentation that shows an upgraded chat feature that allows users to have interactions on a embeded product.

title: ScoutJS
description: Brainchild full stack project: an internal telemetry service that enables capturing front-end logs & able to notify & display history, trends, pattern flow, errors & data object parsing.
Did project proposal, documentation and presentation across department executives.

title: Wack-a-Mole Game
description: A multiplayer wack-a-mole game. Used as a proof of concept using web sockets in node. Tested with coworkers over WIFI.

title: Flowmulate
description: [Best Thesis, IT 2015]  a flowchart algorithm design, simulation and code generation web app. It was initially designed for programming professors to assist students in learning.
Able to design logics blocks through flowcharts, run and simulate it, export into different programming languages and even have examinations scored automatically.

title: Generic Service Mgmt System
description: A general use management system for most kinds of service provider.

title: Tic Tac Toe vs Bot
description: A small tic tac toe game project using Java which can be played against the computer. Project for java programming class.

title: jaycsantos.com v3 (self)

title: Putt More Base
description: Puzzle physics mini-golf game sequel. Clients include TurboNuke.com, Andkon.com, IPC Media (mousebreaker.com).
Implemented a realistic physics engine using Box2D.
Features include leaderboards, shareable solutions, and user-created levels from level editor.

Added features like ratings, comments, challenges, online presence, achievements, scoring and seasonal leaderboards.

title: Hard Court
